body_html: Hi @tatatodd - Ok. Then I have a feature request - would it be possible to include, as a parameter, the type of loss/objective function when initializing DNNLinearCombinedRegressor? This would greatly help make the loss function explicitly visible and ensure the model is converging on the expected function.
body_text: Hi @tatatodd - Ok. Then I have a feature request - would it be possible to include, as a parameter, the type of loss/objective function when initializing DNNLinearCombinedRegressor? body: Hi @tatatodd - Ok. Then I have a feature request - would it be possible to include, as a parameter, the type of loss/objective function when initializing DNNLinearCombinedRegressor? This would greatly help make the loss function explicitly visible and ensure the model is converging on the expected function.
